QNodeEditor.history package¶

Submodules¶

QNodeEditor.history.history module¶

Class handling history for node scenes

class QNodeEditor.history.history.History(scene: NodeScene, enabled: bool = True)¶

Bases: object

Class that handles state history for node scenes

descriptions() → list[str]¶

Get a list of the descriptions of the changes in the history stack :return: list[str]: list of history change descriptions

redo() → None¶

Restore the last undo :return: None

reset() → None¶

Clear the history of all stamps and store current state :return: None

store_change(description: str) → None¶

Store a new stamp in the history stack with a description of the changes in it :param description: description of the change for this stamp :return: None

undo() → None¶

Revert the last change :return: None

Module contents¶
